parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts position from world space to object model space in [[Simulation vs Render Time Scope|render time scope]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[worldToModelVisual]] worldPosition </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> worldPosition: [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [[PositionRelative]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = myObject [[worldToModelVisual]] [0,0,0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = [[player]] [[worldToModelVisual]] [[position]] car;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = car [[worldToModelVisual]] [12000, 5000];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = unit [[worldToModelVisual]] [[position]] tank;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[worldToModel]], [[vectorWorldToModelVisual]], [[modelToWorldVisual]], [[modelToWorld]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
